name: JLoom

screenshots.caption: Eclipse with WTP and JLoom plugin

short_description: JLoom is a JSP like template language for text generation - e.g. source code, HTML, XML. JLoom templates are modular encapsulated. Parameters can be any Java type, even Generics or Varargs. There is a plugin for Eclipse and a command line tool.
